resources.string: You must enter a term to search for
You must select at least one category

This app gets you news articles from the New York Times using the website\'s API. There are 6 categories of articles to choose from, you can search for specific topics using the search functionality and get notified once a day if articles talking about a specific topic gets published on the website.\nPlease note that your device must be connected to the internet for the app to work.

The articles are divided into 6 categories: Top Stories, Most Popular, Arts, Business, Politics and Travel. You can switch categories by swiping right/left, clicking the corresponding tab or using the drawer menu. Just click an article on the list to read it.
Here you can search for a specific topic by entering a term to search for and at least one category. You can also choose to search for articles published before/after/between a specific date.

You can choose to receive notifications once a day about a specific topic. Like the search functionality, you must enter a term to look for and at least one category. If you decide to change the term or a category while the notifications are on, the notifications will be disabled, so make sure to turn them back on by clicking the switch.
